product_name: REI Endeavor Hiking Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: The REI Endeavor Hiking pants are a staple for trekking and traveling around the world. They offer durability and performance with a classic fit to make your adventures comfortable and enjoyable. Rugged double-weave polyester/spandex fabric provides 4-way stretch for excellent range of motion and comfort while climbing and hiking; fabric resists abrasion. Fabric is wind resistant up to 30 mph and has a Durable Water Repellent coating to help shed moisture; also wicks moisture and dries quickly. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. 2 drop-in hand pockets, a zippered rear pocket, a rip-and-stick rear pocket, and a zippered, bonded side pocket stow your trail essentials. Reinforced knees and scuff guards at the ankles ensure long-lasting wear. Polyester tricot lines the waistband to wick sweat and enhances comfort next to skin. Built-in webbing belt helps you fine-tune the fit. Leg shapes are engineered to fit the body well and ease natural movement, without adding seams. Crotch gusset extends the range of motion. Drawcords at the cuffs can be tightened to seal out trail debris. The REI Endeavor Hiking pants have a classic fit that's cut just right for easy wearing.
short_description: The REI Endeavor Hiking pants are a staple for trekking and traveling around the world. They offer durability and performance with a classic fit to make your adventures comfortable and enjoyable.
